heading: Today
text: Some early sun northeast.  Thickening clouds, with rain spreading north through NY, reaching into the Berkshires and Green Mountains. A rising chance of showers, mainly afternoon, east into NH.  Highs 40s to near 50 north, low to mid 50s south.  Light winds, becoming east 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west, and near 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph east of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of rain, and locally strong winds.  Lows in the upper 30s to low 40s north, in the 40s south.  Winds east 10 to 25 mph, gusting 30 to 45 mph, strongest over higher terrain.

heading: Friday
text: Some morning rain north, then mostly cloudy with scattered to numerous showers, tapering off south.  Highs in the low to mid 50s.  East winds shifting to the southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Hallowe’en
text: Some morning rain north, then mostly cloudy with scattered to numerous showers, tapering off south.  Highs in the low to mid 50s.  East winds shifting to the southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 35 mph.
